TopicTitle: Chatter used to work for me, now it isn't.

Articles.Content: A few months ago, I installed chatterer (manually). It worked great for a few months until I decided to switch over to the much less meticulous CKAN method of installation. I reinstalled and updated a few of my manually installed mods, including chatterer, via CKAN when I'd switched over. After that, chatterer ceased to work. I've reattempted getting chatterer to work several times over, to no avail. I can't tell if I'm installing an outdated version of the mod, or if I have another mod obstructing chatterer's abilities. All help is appreciated, thank you.
